item.title: Eros, ananke, play (it ain39t all bad)
item.description: In addressing the purpose of life, Sigmund Freud famously said "Work and love, love and work - that's all there is." With all respect to Freud, I disagree. He left out play.1 Love and nessesity. “Two-fold foundation of society: the compulsion to work, which was created by external necessity, and...
